Comment: I am genuinely unsure how to feel about this. Couldn’t this cause problems for our drug supply, and specifically for those at the bottom on Medicaid? I could see a situation where people who can afford it or have access to private insurance can just buy drugs but those on Medicaid literally cannot due to a shortage of drugs willing to be sold at those prices.  Strong controls like this might work if MOST Americans were on public healthcare, but in the absence of that doesn’t this just speed along complete privatization?
